1.「そ 村王……！ お戻りか！？: So, the village king... You're back!

2.「いや <pc>だったか……。| おどろかせて すまなかった。| だが いいとこ: No<pc> I'm sorry. I'm sorry to scare you. But you've|come to the right place...

3.「じつは 村王クリフゲーンさまが| 帰りの遅い村人を探しに| 雪山に行ったまま: The village king, Lord Cliffe Gane, went into|the snowy mountains to look for a villager|who was late returning and never came back.

4.「ちがったか……。お前は 旅の者だな。| ふむ。<pc>というのか。: I'm sorry. You're a traveler... ...<pc> I'm sorry.

5.「じつは このランガーオ村の村王である| クリフゲーンさまが 帰りの遅い村人を探:
The king of this village, Lord Cliffhanger,|went to the snow-covered mountains to look|for a villager who was late coming home, and|
|never came back.

6.「村王は お父さんを 探しにいったの！: The Village King has gone to find his father!

7.「お父さんが帰ってこないのって 私が言ったら| すぐに連れ戻してくるから お前は: If I tell you that your father isn't coming|home, I'll bring him right back, and you can|just wait and not worry.

8.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに| 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが|:
It's not uncommon for the village king to go|searching for the villagers when they don't|return from the snowy mountains, but I've|
|never seen him return so late...

10.「おおっ 本当か！ 恩に着るぞ！: Oh, really? ! I'm in your debt!

11.「お父さんは 今日は| ラギ雪原の方に行くって 言ってました。| 町で売れる素材: Dad said we're going to the Ragi Snowfield|today. He said he was going to gather|materials to sell in town...

12.「村王にも そう伝えたから| そっちの方に行けば| きっと ふたりに 会えるはず: That's what I've told the village king, so|I'm sure we'll see each other over there!

13.「ラギ雪原は ランガーオ山地の東端から| 北へ抜けた所にある 厳しい雪原だ。|:
The Ragi Snowfield is just north of the|eastern edge of the Langao Mountains, and is|a harsh... If you're going there, take|
|this...

15.「それは 雪山で体力をうばわれぬよう| 身体を あたためるための 薬草の一種だ。: It's a medicinal herb used to warm the body|so that it doesn't lose its strength in the|snowy mountains.

16.「もしも 村王や フウミの父親が| 寒さで弱っていたら それを食べさせてくれ。|: If the village king or Fumi's father were|weak from the cold, we could feed them...|Please...

17.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと| 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！: <pc> Hello! Please take care of your father and|the Village King!

18.「おおっ 恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが| どうやら 今は 頼まれごとが|: Oh, I'm in your debt... I'd say you owe me a|favor, but it looks like you have a lot of|favors to do right now.

19.「無理強いはできんが こちらも急を要する。| できるなら 手を空けてきて| 私の: I don't want to impose, but it's urgent. I|was wondering if you'd be so kind as to make|yourself available and do me a favor.

20.「そ そうか……。| こうなったら 村王が 無事に戻られることを| 天に祈るより: I see... I can only pray to the heavens that|the Village King will return safely...

22.「もう一度 頼もう。| 村王が 帰りの遅い村人を探しに| 雪山に行ったまま 戻っ: Once again... The village king went into the|snowy mountains to look for a villager who|was late coming home, and he never came back.

23.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに| 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが|:
It's not uncommon for the village king to go|searching for the villagers when they don't|return from the snowy mountains, but I've|
|never seen him return so late...

25.「おお <pc>！| 村王と フウミの父親は 見つかったのか！？: oh!<pc> What? Did you find the village king and|Fumi's father?

26.「そうか。まだか……。| いや 急かして すまない。: ... I'm not ready. No, no, no. I'm sorry.

27.「村王と フウミの父親は| ラギ雪原の方に 向かったと思われる。| そちらを 重: I think the village king and Fumi's father|are headed for the Ragi snowfield. I'll focus|my search there...

28.「頼りは お前だけなのだ。| よろしく頼むぞ。: You're my only hope. Nice to meet you.

29.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと| 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！: <pc> Hello! Please take care of your father and|the Village King!

33.「……目を覚ませ クーガ。| どうやら 神さまは まだ| わしらを 死なせてくれ: ... Wake up. Apparently, the gods haven't let|us die yet.

34.「いかんな……。寒さで 意識を| 失ってしまっている。何か 身体を| あたためる: No, no, no. The cold has knocked me|unconscious. I wish I had something to keep|me warm...

36.「お前は 村から来たのだろう？| だったら ランガーオ村の者から| 何か あずか: You're from the village, aren't you? If|you're from the village, don't you have|anything to give from the people of Langao?

37.<pc>は 村王クリフゲーンに|ヌーク草を 渡した。: <pc> ...to the village king, Cliffe Gane, for|Nookweed.

38.「おお ヌーク草を持ってきてくれたか！| よし！ これさえあれば！: Oh, you brought the nookweed! All right! All|I need is this!

42.「さすが 効果絶大だな。| よし わしも ひとクチいただこう。: That's what I'm talking about. Okay, I'll|take a hit.

43.「いやあ ありがとうございました。| おかげで 血が沸き立つくらい| 全身ポカポ: Oh, thank you... Thanks to you, my blood is|boiling all over... I can make it back to the|village!

44.「村王も ありがとうございました。| もし 村王が岩陰に運んでくれなかったら|:
Thank you, Village King... If it wasn't for|the Village King carrying me to the shade of|the rocks, I might have frozen to death by|
|now...

45.「ガハハ！ わしに 礼はいらん！| わしも 寒さに体力をうばわれて| ここまで運: Gahaha! Don't thank me! I, too, was so weak|from the cold I could barely carry myself up|here...

46.「ヌーク草も持たずに 雪山に来るとは| わしも うかつだったわ。| いや それよ: I'd be foolish to come to the snowy mountains|without nook grass... No, more importantly...

47.「この わしが 雪山で動けなくなる日が| 来るとはな……。: I never thought the day would come when I'd|be stuck in the snow...

48.「いやいや。そんなこと言ってる場合ではない。| ヌーク草の 効果が切れる前に|: I don't... We don't have time for this...|We'd better get back to the village before|the Nuke Weed wears off!

49.「ガハハ！ <pc>よ！| お前には 礼をせねばな！| 村に戻ったら わしの家ま: Gahaha!<pc> Hey! I have you to thank for this! When you|get back to the village, come to my house!

50.「おっ <pc> 戻ったか！| ガハハ！ 待っていたぞ！: Whoa<pc> You're back! Ha ha ha! I've been waiting for|you!

51.「お前が 村に来てくれて 助かった！| もし お前が いなかったらと思うと| ぞ: I'm so glad you came to our village! I|shudder to think what we would have done if|you hadn't been there! Ga-ha-ha!

52.「<pc>さん ありがとうございました。| おかげで お父さんも 村王も| 無事: <pc> Thank you very much... Thanks to you, Father|and the King of the village have returned|safely...

53.「採取の帰りに 急に吹雪が強くなりまして……。| 雪山には 慣れているつもりだっ:
On the way back from collecting, the blizzard|suddenly got stronger... I thought I was|accustomed to snow-covered mountains, but|
|it's a shame...

54.「まあ みんな無事で なによりだ！| そうだ ギュラン。忘れないうちに| あれを: Well, I'm glad everyone's okay! Hey, Gee...|Oh, before I forget.<pc> I'll give it to...

55.「これは 私と村王からの 心ばかりの お礼だ。| 受け取ってくれ。: This is a heartfelt gift from me and the|village king... We received...

57.「<pc>さん！| 今度 うちにも 遊びにきてくださいね！: <pc> Thank you! Please come visit us sometime!

58.「今 この村の 若くて強い連中は| みんな 修行の旅に出ている。その間くらいは|:
Right now, all the young and strong people in|this village are on a training trip... I|thought I'd protect the village for the time|
|being, but...

59.「……わしも トシをとったということか。| どうやら もう 若い頃と| 同じよう: ... I've grown old. Apparently, I'm not the|same person I was when I was young.

60.「そういえば 村王。| 村王が 村を離れられている間に| こんな手紙が 届いてお: By the way... While the King was away from|the village, we received this letter...

61.「おお。わしにか？| わしに手紙など めずらしいな。: Oh. Is that for me? It's no trouble to write|to me...
